name: Spacivery
description:
You're the messenger! In space! What an amazing job! But wait... your bag does something strange and... your items change every 10 seconds as your destination! Deliver as much as possible in 3 minutes, our space messenger, this is your SPACIVERY!

Gmaeplay:
Follow the red arrow to get to the houses, to deliver packages! But hurry up, you need to deliver your package until it changes on another one!

Controls:

WASD - moving

Shift - spring running

Space - throw your item (some items can help you, by throwing them)
